definitions.definition: Inflection of you (plural) used as the object of a verb or non- locative preposition in a clause whose subject is the same (the people addressed).
You (plural), used to intensify the subject as the group addressed.
examples: You yourselves won’t eat at that restaurant. Why are you recommending it to us?

main_definition: ( reflexive pronoun ) Inflection of you (plural) used as the object of a verb or non- locative preposition in a clause whose subject is the same (the people addressed).
secondary_definitions: ( emphatic ) You (plural), used to intensify the subject as the group addressed.
